code: import React from"react";import crossicon from"../../images/crossicon.png";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";import styles from"./QuizPublishedPopup.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function QuizPublishedPopup(_ref){let{setIsQuizPublishedPopupOpen,newlyCreatedQuizId}=_ref;const handleCross=()=>{setIsQuizPublishedPopupOpen(false);};const message="Your link is here : http://localhost:3000/quiz/".concat(newlyCreatedQuizId);const handleShareBtn=()=>{const link="http://localhost:3000/quiz/".concat(newlyCreatedQuizId);navigator.clipboard.writeText(link).then(()=>{toast.success("Link copied to Clipboard");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.shareBox,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.cross,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:handleCross,className:styles.crossIcon,src:crossicon,alt:"crossicon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.text,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Congrats your Quiz is "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Published!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:styles.input,value:message})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.section2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleShareBtn,className:styles.shareBtn,children:"Share"})})]});}export default QuizPublishedPopup;
